definition: Red Army (1928-1937), predecessor of the PLA/(Soviet) Red Army (1917-1946)

sentences.english: 5 the central army, save dared stand up for the reds.
sentences.chinese: 五戰中央軍，解救紅軍張敢爲。

sentences.english: Lucas Levia would love to play at Wembley for Liverpool.
sentences.chinese: 盧卡斯表示，他願意爲紅軍在溫布利球場比賽。

sentences.english: Our Red Army men fought a good battle.
sentences.chinese: 紅軍戰士打了一場漂亮仗。

sentences.english: Snow fell all night on the mountain .
The Red Army's glorious revolutionary traditions have carried over to the present day.
sentences.chinese: 紅軍的光榮革命傳統一直髮揚到今天。

sentences.english: Great all- China meetings of Party and Red Army delegates were called in May and June.
sentences.chinese: 黨和紅軍的全國代表大會五月和六月間分別召開了。

sentences.english: It is inappropriate to advocate a "contest of attrition " for the Chinese Red Army today.
sentences.chinese: “拚消耗”的主張，對於中國紅軍來說是不適時宜的。

sentences.english: Jamie Carragher has talked about a "massive week" approaching for the Reds.
sentences.chinese: 克拉格談到過對紅軍來說“至關重要的一週。”

sentences.english: The Reds midfielder is undecided whether he will follow team-mate Jamie Carragher by taking his coaching badges.
sentences.chinese: 紅軍隊長還未決定是否跟隨隊友卡拉格考取教練證書。

sentences.english: The Red Army men once wrote down their heroic feat here.
sentences.chinese: 中國工農紅軍也曾在這裏的雪山草地裏書寫壯舉。

sentences.english: After that the Red Army work-team went to talk to my father.
sentences.chinese: 之後，紅軍工作隊就去找我父親談話。

sentences.english: Both he and Tord Grip gew up supporting the Reds.
sentences.chinese: 他和助手格里普從小都是紅軍的支持者。

sentences.english: The Red Army arrived in Haldensleben on June 1.
sentences.chinese: 紅軍在6月1日到達哈爾登斯萊。

sentences.english: Absolute equalitarianism became quite serious in the Red Army at one time.
sentences.chinese: 紅軍中的絕對平均主義，有一個時期發展得很厲害。

sentences.english: After a time the enemy was baying across all south Kiangsi, hunting for the elusive Reds.
sentences.chinese: 不久以後，敵人就在贛南到處追逐行蹤不定的紅軍。

sentences.english: Because Du Gongjun's son longs for a mother, object Du Gongjun remarrying all the time.
sentences.chinese: 杜紅軍的兒子因爲思念母親，一直反對杜紅軍再婚。

definition: to encircle and annihilate/refers to repeated campaigns of the Guomindang against the communists from 1930 onwards
to break a siege/to break out of an enclosure
commander-in-chief/top military commander for a country or theater of operations
Jinggang Mountains, in the Jiangxi-Hunan border region
Jinggangshan county level city in Ji'an 吉安, Jiangxi
